name: Rolling Ball: The Laborious Labyrinth Of The Rolling Sphere
name_original: Rolling Ball: The Laborious Labyrinth Of The Rolling Sphere
description:
A basic, frustrating, difficult, and  low quality rolling ball game. As the levels progress the sky gets more red and the obstacles get more difficult, in the later levels you may find invisible boxes that bring you all the way back to level. There are 6 levels total

Controls: WASD movement, camera is moved with mouse/arrow keys, jump is space/left click, ESC closes the game, controller compatible.
